document.body:

Progress Indicator iTunes iTunes is the world's easiest way to organize and add to your digital media collection.
We are unable to find iTunes on your computer. To download the free app Photo Safe Pro by My Eyes Only™ by Software Ops LLC, get iTunes now.
Already have iTunes? Click I Have iTunes to open it now. iTunes for Mac + PC Photo Safe Pro by My Eyes Only™
By Software Ops LLC View More By This Developer Open iTunes to buy and download apps.
Description
No risk tryout for free! Photo Safe Pro by My Eyes Only™ is an iOS app that will protect your private photos from prying eyes. You Need this App If...
If... -You have pictures you want to keep safe, secured with encryption and password protected -You are a private person and don’t want your family photos viewed by strangers if they steal your iOS device -You want to use your new iPhones to take close ups of all your credit cards and IDs -You are a spy and want to take photos of secret documents -You have compromising photos of your lover you don’t want published on the internet if you leave your phone at a fast food restaurant -You have compromising photos of yourself you don’t want published on the internet if you leave your phone at a fast food restaurant -You have photos that you don’t want your better half to see -You have photos you don’t want your parents to see
!!! Encryption so Strong, it Needed U.S. Government Approval for Export !!! All photos are stored using 256 bit encryption. Do your homework on this feature, most cheap photo keeper apps DON’T encrypt the photos. How safe is that? Answer, not safe at all. Are you serious about security, them encryption is necessary.
This is a Try-Before-You-Buy App so give it a try! Try-Before-You-Buy means there are a limited number of photos you can add to this app before you need to upgrade. It allows 2 categories with 10 photos in each category. So give it a try and if you like it, use the In-App-Purchase to unlock unlimited photos and categories. If you don’t like it, then delete it. No big deal! We think this app, with its superior encryption and password protection, provides protection of your photos from real world threats.
Photo Safe Pro Advanced Features USB Transfers using iTunes File Sharing photo import and export. WiFi Transfers using Bonjour and your web browser. - Universal iOS app meaning its user interface is designed for the iPad and the iPhone/iPod. Password protected with long passwords using characters and numbers Printing - Import Photos from Photos App, Camera Roll, directly from a camera - WiFi an Bluetooth photo transfers from iOS device to iOS device running Photo Safe Pro Pro - Create personalized folders - 16X full sized photo zoom - Copy and Paste photos from other apps - Copy and Paste into Message App, (Note: you have to paste the photo that is in the past buffer) - Send photos in emails
UI and Usability Features Blazing decryption performance on iPad and iPhone 4 and new iPods; don’t forget that before photos can be displayed they are decrypted. Retina Display support - Muti-touch photo browsing, swipe, pinch, tap, double tap, two finger tap NEW look and feel throughout the app
Full Data Wipe and Password Reset If somebody tries to access your private photos stored in Photo Safe Pro and enters the wrong password six times, all your photos will be deleted and the password will be reset.
Advanced Password Features With Photo Safe Pro, like My Eyes Only(tm), forgetting your password doesn’t mean you can’t get access to the application. A password hint feature is provided to help the user remember their password. It also has a configurable password recovery question and answer that allows users to select their own private question and answer to help the gain access to their photos. Software Ops LLC Web Site Photo Safe Pro by My Eyes Only™ Support What's New in Version 1.1.9
Removed the feature that would display the last viewed photo. It know will just display the photo library list. This feature was causing problems for some users.
Screenshots iPhone iPad View In iTunes This app is designed for both iPhone and iPad Free Category: Photo&Video Updated: Jul 12, 2012 Version: 1.1.9 Size: 3.5 MB Language: English Seller: Software Ops LLC © Software Ops LLC Rated 4+ Requirements: Compatible with iPhone, iPod touch, and iPad.Requires iOS 4.0 or later.
Customer Ratings We have not received enough ratings to display an average for the current version of this application. All Versions: 811 Ratings Top In-App Purchases
